医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关于患者-外科医生性别一致性和术后死亡率的新见解《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项美国大型研究发现，无论男性或女性外科医生为男性还是女性患者进行手术，大手术后的死亡率相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-病人-外科医生-性别-concordance-and-post-surgical-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-病人-外科医生-性别-concordance-and-post-surgical-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22a132a-8784-4780-b034-c743b363cba6 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:35:00 -0500 New insights into patient-surgeon gender concordance and post-surgical mortality
首次感染前接种 COVID-19 疫苗可降低长期感染新冠病毒的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，在第一次感染前至少接种一剂 covid-19 疫苗与降低发生 covid-19 后病症（通常称为长期 covid）的风险密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-vaccination-before-first-infection-may-reduce-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-vaccination-before-first-infection-may-reduce-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93c7a068-b510-4825-9a5c-9f17af844c54 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:27:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccination before first infection may reduce risk of developing long COVID
研究表明盲人可以通过声音识别面孔乔治城大学医学中心的神经科学家和同事使用一种将图像转换为声音的专用设备表明，盲人使用大脑中称为梭形面部区域的部分来识别基本面孔，该区域对于处理面部表情至关重要。有视力的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Blind-people-can-recognize-faces-using-sound-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Blind-people-can-recognize-faces-using-sound-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f816e7a-e5a0-426a-95f0-0d8d6083a25a Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:22:12 -0500 Blind people can recognize faces using sound, study shows
麻醉剂利多卡因可能具有抗癌特性宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员表示，利多卡因通常用作门诊医疗程序的麻醉剂，通过两种独特的机制激活某些苦味受体，从而导致癌细胞死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Numbing-agent-lidocaine-may-have-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Numbing-agent-lidocaine-may-have-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a385c58-d5de-4af5-9de4-a5d338e0520c Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:15:07 -0500 Numbing agent lidocaine may have cancer-fighting properties
关于大脑控制进食速度的新见解当你急切地吃一顿期待已久的晚餐时，从你的胃到大脑的信号会阻止你吃得太多，以至于让你后悔——或者人们是这么认为的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-the-brains-control-of-eating-speed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-the-brains-control-of-eating-speed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91f4d718-519d-464b-9d70-17924805c790 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:02:24 -0500 New insights into the brain's control of eating speed
干细胞移植的新方法可能会克服免疫排斥细胞和器官移植可以挽救生命，但由于缺乏合适的捐赠者，患者常常会遇到很长的等待名单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-approach-to-stem-cell-transplantation-may-overcome-immune-rejection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-approach-to-stem-cell-transplantation-may-overcome-immune-rejection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50b60a68-3538-4c34-99f1-ab1986e236bf Wed, 22 Nov 2023 21:39:07 -0500 New approach to stem cell transplantation may overcome immune rejection
开发出用于胎儿 DNA 测序的非侵入性基因测试来自麻省总医院 (MGH)、布莱根妇女医院 (BWH) 以及麻省理工学院和哈佛大学博德研究所的一组研究人员开发了一种非侵入性基因测试，可以筛查怀孕个体的血液，以调查胎儿的所有基因DNA 序列变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Non-induced-genic-test-for-fetal-DNA-sequencing-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Non-guarantee-genic-test-for-fetal-DNA-sequencing-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d6129c6-b1c3-475e-9d97-2632bad4b10f Wed, 22 Nov 2023 21:15:29 -0500 Non-invasive genetic test for fetal DNA sequencing developed
单次注射新型水凝胶可以取代每周一次的糖尿病注射斯坦福大学的材料工程师开发了一种新型水凝胶药物输送系统，将每日或每周注射糖尿病和体重控制药物（如 Ozempic、Mounjaro、Trulicity、Victoza 等）改为每四个月注射一次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Single-injection-of-novel-Hydrogel-could-replace-weekly-diabetes-injections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Single-injection-of-novel-Hydrogel-could-replace-weekly-diabetes-injections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a543ffe1-abb8-435c-b932-5b81f6aa6187 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:43:49 -0500 Single injection of novel hydrogel could replace weekly diabetes injections
黑人孕妇面临多种心理健康问题的高风险波士顿学院威廉·F·康奈尔护理学院教授苏珊·根纳罗 (Susan Gennaro) 博士、注册护士、FAAN 及其《护士从业者》杂志的同事发表的研究结果表明，黑人孕妇经常会遇到不止一种心理健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Black-pregnant-individuals-at-high-risk-for-multiple-mental-health-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Black-pregnant-individuals-at-high-risk-for-multiple-mental-health-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af16116d-7c5a-4428-bd1b-c2fb5d2c6b1f Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:33:28 -0500 Black pregnant individuals at high risk for multiple mental health concerns
研究发现常见皮肤细菌是此前未知的瘙痒罪魁祸首哈佛医学院的科学家首次证明，一种常见的皮肤细菌 -；金黄色葡萄球菌 -;可以通过直接作用于神经细胞引起瘙痒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-identizes-common-skin-bacter-as-previously-unknown-culprit-behind-itch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-identizes-common-skin-bacter-as-previously-unknown-culprit-behind-itch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b38360-569a-412d-beca-f569d8b1e411 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:23:44 -0500 Study identifies common skin bacterium as previously unknown culprit behind itch
